body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia                    A Hidden Gem   8 Photos  Media Quality Images of Upper Delaware Scenic and Recreational River - 2016 Centennial Celebration          Zane Grey   37 Photos  Slides depicting the life and writtings of famed western writer Zane Grey.          The Delaware and Hudson Canal   52 Photos  The slide program will run through the history of the Delaware and Hudson Canal.            Bald Eagles   25 Photos  A selection of photographs of Upper Delaware's bald eagles, including chicks, hunting and feeding eagles, and birds at rest.          Invasive Plants of Upper Delaware   12 Photos  Invasive plants that can be found in the Upper Delaware corridor.          Internship Program   52 Photos  Images will illustrate the park's internship program.
title: Upper Delaware Scenic & Recreational River: Photos & Multimedia
